org.jcatapult.domain
Interface Auditable

All Superinterfaces:
TimeStampable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AuditableImpl, AuditableSoftDeletableImpl
public interface Auditable
extends TimeStampable

This interface marks a class as being auditable where the user and time the class was saved to the database is saved as well as the user and time it was last updated is also saved.

Method Summary
 String getInsertUser()
           
 String getUpdateUser()
           
 void setInsertUser(String insertUser)
          Sets the user that inserted this entity.
 void setUpdateUser(String updateUser)
          Sets the user that updated this entity.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.jcatapult.domain.TimeStampable
getInsertDate, getUpdateDate, setInsertDate, setUpdateDate
 

Method Detail

getInsertUser

String getInsertUser()
Returns:
The user that inserted this entity, null if the entity is transient or so type of signifier if the entity was inserted by someone anonymous.

setInsertUser

void setInsertUser(String insertUser)
Sets the user that inserted this entity. This should be set to a signifier if the entity is being inserted by an anonymous user.

Parameters:
insertUser - The insert user.

getUpdateUser

String getUpdateUser()
Returns:
The user that updated this entity last, null if the entity is transient or so type of signifier if the entity was updated by someone anonymous.

setUpdateUser

void setUpdateUser(String updateUser)
Sets the user that updated this entity. This should be set to a signifier if the entity is being updated by an anonymous user.

Parameters:
updateUser - The update user.
